author: Special Correspondent
text:
The newly established escalator at Tiruchi railway junction started rolling on Sunday.

It was inaugurated by Railway Minister Suresh Prabhakar Prabhu through video conferencing at a function held at East Tambaram in Chennai.

The facility has been put in place at a cost of Rs. 91 lakh with funds provided by DMK Rajya Sabha member Tiruchi Siva.
title: Escalator begins to roll in Tiruchi
